name: The Club (itch) (Samuel Hudgins)
description:
The Club is a 3D foodservice sim that takes place in the afterlife and puts players in the shoes of a waiter that has to serve drinks and snacks to ghosts in a comedy club! Players have to balance the food and drinks on a tray and stretch their ghostly arms to the correct table and deliver the order.

Now with more options

This game can be played in a variety of ways: 

  • Keyboard and mouse
  • Xbox and PlayStation controller
  • Oculus Quest
Must go faster

 As the game progresses more ghosts will come into the club, so waiters will need to deliver more food to more customers!

Credits

Made for MICA Advanced 3D Game Design course by Mark Kershaw, Hongbing Pan, and Samuel Hudgins
